title: Silly O' Clock
description: Maddy and Ollie are a couple of ordinary kids who generally lead a normal life. When the clock strikes Silly o' Clock, their house turns into a circus! The walls magically go from boring to bright, lions are roaring, monkeys are flying and their Mommy even starts clowning around! A fun, adventurous book the whole family will enjoy.
author: M.J. Twinley
